item.title: A thought-provoking look at the gene-editing revolution
item.description: Walter Isaacson’s latest book profiles Jennifer Doudna and her remarkable discovery.

item.title: How far would you go to save the world?
item.description: Even if you aren’t a big science fiction fan, Project Hail Mary is a lot of fun.
